mapper.insert: insert into users (uno, userid, passwd, email, uname, name, passport, sex, birth, post, address1, address2, createdate, eaccess) values(SEQ_USERS_uno.nextval, #{userid}, #{passwd},#{email}, #{uname},#{name},#{passport}, #{sex},to_date(#{birth},'YYYY-MM-DD'),#{post}, #{address1},#{address2}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select: select count(*) from users where userid =#{userid}
select count(*) from users where email =#{email}
select count(*) from users where uname =#{uname}
